title: Aloo Mutter Curry| Potato Peas Curry |Side Dish
content:
Side dish: Curry RecipeÂ  Servings: 2 Duration: 30 minutesÂ  Any dish made with potatoes are awesome, delicious and addictive â˜ºï¸ too. Itâ€™s the king of all vegetables and tastes great in any variety and loved all over the world ğŸŒÂ It can be potato chips/ French fries ğŸŸ/Â Aloo ParathaÂ /Â Potato SandwichÂ or curries all these plays their scrumptious food role and activates your taste buds. I love potatoes who doesnâ€™t? â˜ºï¸ Today Iâ€™m sharing easy and tasty side dish forÂ Chapathi,Â Garlic butter Naan,Â PooriÂ or serve with piping hot rice ğŸšÂ topped with ghee or clarified butter. Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Potatoes ğŸ¥”Â - 3 - Peeled off and diced
  • Green peas - frozen - 1 cup - 80 gms
  • Onion - 1 - medium sized- finely chopped
  • Tomato ğŸ…Â - Â 1 medium - Finely chopped
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 5 - chopped
  • Bay leaf - 1
  • cloves - 1
  • Cinnamon stick - small piece
  • Water - 250 ml
  • Oil - 2 tb sp
  • Coriander leaves - 1/4 cup - chopped
  • Masala paste : Grounded ğŸ‘‡
  1. Cloves 2
  2. cinnamon half inch
  3. Poppy seeds Â - 1 Tb sp
  4. Dry coconut powder - 2 Tb sp
  5. Green chillies - 3
  6. Ginger - 1 Tb sp - chopped
Procedure:
  • On medium heated skillet pan add oil
  • Add in cumin seeds, curry leaves, bay leaf, cloves and cinnamon. SautÃ© 30 secs
  • Add onion and sautÃ© 2 minutes
  • Then goes in chopped potatoes , sautÃ© 5 minutes
  • Next add masala paste , salt, turmeric powder, red chilly powder, Garam masala powder. Combine well for 2 minutes
  • Next goes chopped tomatoes, cook until they become mushy
  • After that add peas and sautÃ© a minute, immediately add water and mix well
  • Cook the potatoes by covering with lid for 12 minutes over medium heat
  • Let the water evaporate and infuse the flavours in potatoes and peas
  • Turn off heat and add coriander leaves, once combine everything and serve with hot phulkas or puri or rice or naan
  • Aloo Mutter curry is ready to serve ğŸ™‚ Happy Cooking and have a wonderful day ğŸŒ
